cards.name: Bonesaw
cards.text: If a friendly creature was destroyed this turn, Bonesaw enters play ready.

cards.name: Sinder
cards.text:
Taunt.
Reap: Destroy a friendly creature.

cards.name: Snarette
cards.text:
At the end of your turn, capture 1A.
Action: Move each A from Snarette to the common supply.

cards.name: Stirring Grave
cards.text: Play: Archive a creature from your discard pile.

cards.name: Waking Nightmare
cards.text:
Enhance Capture.
Play: Keys cost +1A for each Dis creature in play during your opponent's next turn.

cards.name: Double Doom
cards.text: Play: Return an enemy creature to its owner's hand.  Your opponent discards a random card from their hand.

cards.name: Essence Scale
cards.text: Action: Destroy a friendly creature.  If you do, ready and use a friendly creature that shares a house with the destroyed creature.

cards.name: Hystricog
cards.text:
Enhance D D D.
Action:  Destroy a damaged creature.

cards.name: Umbra-Fiend
cards.text:
Elusive.
Destroyed: Steal 1A.

cards.name: Bot Bookton
cards.text: Reap: Play the top card of your deck.

cards.name: Dæmo-Bot
cards.text:
Reap: Discard a card from your hand.  If you do, draw a card.
Destroyed: Steal 1A.

cards.name: Diametric Charge
cards.text: Play: Deal 1D to a creature with 2D splash.

cards.name: Lethologica
cards.text: Play: Discard cards from the top of your deck until you discard a Logos card or run out of cards.  If you discard a Logos card this way, put it into your hand.

cards.name: Munchling
cards.text:
Skirmish.
Fight: You may discard a Logos card from your hand or archives.  If you do, gain 1A.

cards.name: Opposition Research
cards.text:
Enhance D.
Play: Enemy creatures cannot reap during your opponent's next turn.

cards.name: Q-Mechs
cards.text:
Play: Draw a card.
Destroyed: Archive Q-Mechs.

cards.name: Chronus
cards.text:
Enhance Draw Draw.
After you resolve a Draw bonus icon, archive a card. ??? (Translated from Polish.)

cards.name: Novu Dynamo
cards.text: At the start of your turn, you may discard a Logos card from your hand or archives.  If you do, gain 1A.  Otherwise, destroy Novu Dynamo.

cards.name: Adaptoid
cards.text:
Enhance Capture D Draw.
When you play a card with a bonus icon, Adaptoid gains your choice of +2 armor, Assault 2, or "Fight: Steal 1A", until end of turn. ??? (translated from Polish)

cards.name: Cyber-Clone
cards.text: Play: Purge another creature.  Until Cyber-Clone leaves play, it has power equal to the purged creature's power, and gains that creature's armor, keywords, and traits.

cards.name: Mind Over Matter
cards.text: Play:  Put each creature into its owner's archives.

cards.name: It's Coming...
cards.text: Play: Search your deck and discard pile for either half of a gigantic creature, reveal it, and put it into your hand.  Shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Dino-Bot
cards.text:
Play:  You may exalt Dino-Bot.  If you do, deal 3D to a creature.
Reap:  Discard a card from your hand.  If you do, draw a card.

cards.name: Lyco-Bot
cards.text:
Skirmish.
Reap:  Discard a card from your hand.  If you do, draw a card.

cards.name: Umbra-Bot
cards.text:
Elusive.
Reap:  Discard a card from your hand.  If you do, draw a card.

cards.name: Ardent Hero
cards.text:
Taunt.
Ardent Hero cannot be dealt damage by Mutant creatures or creatures with power 5 or higher.

cards.name: Bull-wark
cards.text:
Assault 2.
Each of Bull-wark's neighbors gains assault 2.

cards.name: Font of the Eye
cards.text: Omni: If an enemy creature was destroyed this turn, a friendly creature captures 1A.

cards.name: Seeker of Truth
cards.text: Fight: You may fight with a friendly non-Sanctum creature.

cards.name: Squire Alys
cards.text: Play: Capture 2A.

cards.name: Berinon
cards.text:
After a Mutant creature enters play, enrage Berinon.
Reap: Capture 2A.

cards.name: Gizelhart's Wrath
cards.text: Play:  Destroy each Mutant creature.

cards.name: Ides of March
cards.text: Play: Deal 23D to a creature in the center of a battleline. ??? (Translated from Polish.)

cards.name: Consul Primus
cards.text:
Enhance Capture.
Reap: Move 1A from a creature to another creature.

cards.name: Faust the Great
cards.text:
You opponent's keys cost +1A for each friendly creature with A on it.
Play: You may exalt a friendly creature.

cards.name: Spoils of Battle
cards.text: Play: A friendly creatures captures 1A.  Each creature with A on it captures 1A from its opponent.

cards.name: Hedonistic Intent
cards.text: Play: Exalt each flank creature.

cards.name: Saurian Egg
cards.text:
The Saurian Egg cannot fight or reap.
Omni: Discard the top 2 cards of your deck.  If you discard any Saurian creatures this way, put them into play ready, give them three +1 power counters, and destroy Saurian Egg.

cards.name: Amphora Captura
cards.text:
Enhance A A D D Draw Draw.
When resolving a bonus icon, you may choose to resolve it as a Capture bonus icon instead.

cards.name: Techno-Saurus
cards.text:
Play: You may exalt Techno-Saurus. If you do, deal 3D to a creature.
Reap: Discard a card from your hand.  If you do, draw a card.

cards.name: Deusillus
cards.text:
(Play only with the other half of Deusillus.)
Play:  Capture all of your opponent's A.  Deal 5D to an enemy creature.
Fight/Reap:  Move 1A from Deusillus to the common supply.  Deal 2 to each enemy creature.

cards.name: Rad Penny
cards.text:
Play: Steal 1A.

Destroyed: Shuffle Rad Penny into your deck.

cards.name: Access Denied
cards.text: This creature cannot reap.

cards.name: Blast Shielding
cards.text:
This creatures gets +2 armor.
After this creature is used, its controller may attach Blast Shielding to one of this creature's neighbors.

cards.name: Scout Pete
cards.text: Play/Fight/Reap: Look at the top card of your deck.  You may discard that card.

cards.name: Securi-Droid
cards.text:
Taunt.
Securi-Droid may be played as an upgrade instead of a creature, with the text: "This creature gains taunt."

cards.name: Subdue
cards.text: Play: Deal 1D to a creature and stun it.

cards.name: Subject Kirby
cards.text: Play/Fight/Reap: You may play a non-Star Alliance creature this turn.

cards.name: Survey
cards.text:
Enhance Draw.
Play: Look at the top 2 cards of your deck.  Discard 1 of them.

cards.name: Teleporter Chief Tink
cards.text:
Elusive.
Action: Swap Teleporter Chief Tink with another friendly creature in the battleline.  You may use that other creature this turn.

cards.name: ANT1-10NY
cards.text:
Play: Capture all of your opponent's A.
At the end of your turn, move 1A from ANT1-10NY to your opponent's pool.

cards.name: Armory Officer Nel
cards.text:
Enhance Draw.
After an upgrade enters play, draw a card.

cards.name: Away Team
cards.text: Destroyed: Put each upgrade on Away Team into its owner's archives.

cards.name: Hayden Oswin
cards.text: Reap:  Gain 1A for each upgrade on Hayden Oswin.

cards.name: Mutagenesis Researcher
cards.text: Enhance A Capture D Draw.

cards.name: Particle Sweep
cards.text: Play: Deal 2D to a creature.  If it is a Mutant creature, destroy it instead.

cards.name: Ensign El-Samra
cards.text:
Enhance Draw Draw Draw.
Action: Reveal a card from your hand.  Resolve its bonus icons as if you had played it.

cards.name: Exchange Officer
cards.text: Play/Fight/Reap: Use a friendly Star Alliance card.

cards.name: Matter Maker
cards.text: You may play upgrades as if they were in the active house.

cards.name: Techno-Beast
cards.text:
Skirmish.
Reap: Discard a card from your hand. If you do, draw a card.

cards.name: Niffle Kong
cards.text:
(Play only with the other half of Niffle Kong.)
Play: Search your deck and discard pile for all Niffle creatures, reveal them, and put them into your hand.
Fight/Reap: Destroy a friendly Niffle. If you do, deal 3D to a creature, steal 1A, and  destroy an artifact controlled by your opponent.

cards.name: Ivan the Even???
cards.text: Action:  If your opponent has an even amount of A, steal 1A. ??? (card translated from French and Spanish)

cards.name: Observ-u-Max
cards.text: This creature gains, "Fight/Reap:  Capture 1A."

cards.name: Rapid Evolution
cards.text: Play: Choose a creature.  Give it a +1 power counter for each ??? (A on it?)

cards.name: The Shadowsmith
cards.text: Each Mutant creature gains Elusive.

Keys cost +4A.
Reap: Forge a key at current cost, reduced by 1A for every friendly Sin creature??? (Translated from Spanish.)
